name: greyness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being grey in colour: He could just make out the greyness of the roof between the trees. She has a greyness under her eyes and a slouch from spending most of the day in front of a computer.
(of someone's hair) the quality of being grey or white, usually because of age: She dyes her hair to hide the greyness. Greyness of hair is one of the first signs of ageing.
the state of the weather when there are a lot of clouds and little light: All she remembered about arriving in England was the rain and greyness. Perhaps it was the greyness of the weather that made her choose such brightly coloured clothes.
